messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 3327
messages.msgSnippet: Kim, Thanks so much for sharing. It made me cry I m so happy for you both. ... Barb E The best preparation for the future is a happy today :-) -Sandra Dodd on
messages.messageBody:
Kim,
Thanks so much for sharing. It made me cry I'm so happy for you both.
:-)


Barb E
The best preparation for the future is a happy today :-)

-Sandra Dodd



on 4/18/03 7:42 AM, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com at
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com wrote:

> I can't tell you the happiness I
> felt watching my son run around outside in the sun with his friend,
> laughing and just being a kid again. I can't tell you how choked up I
> was after his friend left and he said to me, mom thanks for letting me
> go about things in my own way, I love my old mom but I really love my
> new mom. He invited another friend to come over today. Just thought
> I'd share with the list that helped make that happen. Thanks
>
> ~Kim
